content: each st 1 treble_crochet in each skipped st until end of row you re now ready to make a border around your blanket of your choosing i made a simple single_crochet round in black around mine as the blanket was busy enough in and of itself you can chose to make this blanket with scrap yarn tied together or you can make actual row and change colours in every row or every other row the blanket will look completely different in those two ways here i ve changed colour every row in this swatch i ve changed colour every two row you can see how different each style is when you use longer scrap yarn sometimes it will look like swatch 1 and sometimes like swatch 2 i think it creates quite a lovely look and texture to the blanket thanks to my amazing testers i could not have done it without you @aricrochet @kellygreenlizzy @bblithely @tinasallsorts @laurenharrisyoga @angeloakcreations @gingernuthouse all on ig the information and photos in this pattern are the sole copyrighted property of gwen kok thewoollycloset you may not copy sell or reproduce any part of this pattern electronically verbally written or otherwise including translations unless i ve given you permission you may make and sell products from this pattern do whatever you like but i ask that you please link back to this pattern
